params._jurToken: - Address of the JUR token contract which will be used for transferring the tokens.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

releaseOath(uint256).details: releaseOath() - Release tokens as per vesting schedule, called by the owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

takeAnOath(uint256).details: takeAnOath - Any JUR token holder can use this function to lock their tokens for a certain time period.

params._lockInPeriod: - Number of months to lock the token for.

takeAnOathJUR(uint256,address).details: takeAnOath - Used for taking an oath as an `allowed` function in JUR Token.

params._lockInPeriod: - Number of months to lock the token for.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateLockPeriod(uint256,uint256).details: updateLockPeriod() - Function for owner to update the lockin period requirements.
